characterDescription:
Ol' White-hair is a man whom Lift misses and describes as being crazy as a box full of minks.
Wyndle asks her if this isn't the self-same man who got himself intentionally swallowed by a Marabethian greashell, to which she replies in the positive.
She likes to pretend that he hadn't gotten eaten. Apparently, he'd winked at her as he'd jumped into the creature's gaping maw, thereby shocking the crowd.
